alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 12 at 12:21AM PST until January 17 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Two periods of heavy snow possible - one on Saturday and one Sunday night through Monday night. Total snow accumulations of one to four feet possible. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; White Mountains of Inyo County
